"'So Sorry, I Said'" is the third single from Liza Minnelli's [[Results]] album.
The single was released by Epic Records in December 1989.

The single stalled in the charts just outside the top 60 at #62. This may have
been in part because the single offered fans nothing newâboth tracks on the 7"
were lifted straight from the album, and the bonus material on the 12" was
already released on the "Losing My Mind" single.

The song was later performed by Pet Shop Boys on their 1991 Performance tour.
